body:
### Features

* Add response minimum data rate ([#1988](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1988))
* Rename min rate APIs for consistency ([#1901](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1901))
* Ensure timeouts are disabled when debugger is attached ([#1884](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1884))
* Validate certificate EKU ([#1764](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1764))
* Change request trace ID format ([#1591](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1591))
* Add flag to disable synchronous IO  ([#1521](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1521))

### Bugs Fixed

* Resuming Connection on closed socket hides connection reset log ([#1331](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1331))

name: 2.0.0-preview2
body:
### Features

* Update kestrel config binding ([#1875](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1875))

### Bugs Fixed

* Min rate applies to upgraded requests as well? ([#1904](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1904))
* LibuvConnection.OnRead throws Nullable object must have a value ([#1824](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1824))
* It's possible to lease blocks from the pool after the pool has been disposed ([#1815](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1815))
* SocketTransport: FIN handling ([#1774](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1774))
* Fail: Uncaught exception from the PrepareRequest method of an IAdaptedConnection ([#1693](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1693))

### Bugs Fixed

* [1.1.2] Don't log stack traces for localhost bind failures (port fix to 1.1.x) ([#1629](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1629))
* [1.1.2] "Unexpected end of request content" preventing terminating chunk from being sent ([#1535](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1535))
* [1.1.2] Exception "Response Content-Length mismatch" on Azure ([#1376](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1376))

### Bugs Fixed

* Don't log stack traces for localhost bind failures (port fix to 1.0.x) ([#1628](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1628))
* [1.0.4] "Unexpected end of request content" preventing terminating chunk from being sent ([#1544](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1544))

name: 2.0.0-preview1
body:
### Features

* Throw if UseUrls specifies HTTPS or path base ([#1519](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1519))
* MaxRequestBufferSize should never be less than MaxRequestHeadersTotalSize ([#1491](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1491))
* Primary headers ([#1482](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1482))
* Add an option to Kestrel to disable threadpool dispatching ([#1390](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1390))
* Add EventSource events ([#1211](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1211))
* Support systemd socket activation ([#1057](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1057))
* Create a direct way to configure endpoints on Kestrel ([#996](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/996))
* Reject requests that don't have a Host header ([#839](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/839))
* Transport agnostic kestrel refactoring ([#828](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/828))

### Bugs Fixed

* Flaky Test: Safe handle has been closed ([#1752](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1752))
* Test failure: LibuvOutputConsumerTests.FailedWriteCompletesOrCancelsAllPendingTasks(maxResponseBufferSize: 1048577) ([#1712](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1712))
* Double free in BufferSegment ([#1690](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1690))
* Connection is not closed gracefully if client disconnected just before Dispose ([#1648](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1648))
* Flaky Test: Functional tests on Linux "disposing listeners failed" ([#1621](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1621))
* Flaky test: RegisterAddresses_IPv4_Success ([#1620](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1620))
* Flaky Test: Kestrel.FunctionalTests sometimes fails with "unable to communicate with test host process" or assert ([#1616](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1616))
* Http parser does not always detect start line correctly  ([#1580](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1580))
* Respect PreferHostingUrls ([#1575](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1575))
* Reject upgrade requests that also have content-length specified ([#1570](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1570))
* Move to WritableBufferWriter ([#1559](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1559))
* Add cancellation support back to SocketOutput ([#1557](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1557))
* "Unexpected end of request content" preventing terminating chunk from being sent ([#1530](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1530))
* NullRef in WriteFast ([#1518](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1518))
* Check if request is aborted before verifying response bytes written ([#1498](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1498))
* Server fails to start with "error -97 EAFNOSUPPORT address family not supported" ([#1474](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1474))
* Log TraceIdentifier for ApplicationErrors ([#1367](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1367))
* Crash under high load ([#1327](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1327))
* Kestrel doesn't log now listening on correctly for https ([#1296](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1296))
* Not all request rejections are logged ([#1295](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1295))
* InvalidOperationException: Response Content-Length mismatch when enabling BrowserLink ([#1289](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1289))
* Enforce restrictions on request-target formats ([#1279](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1279))
* Kestrel: Deadlocked in SocketOutput? ([#1278](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1278))
* Crashing on dispose ([#1231](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1231))
* Delay in client-initiated abort for event stream request ([#1139](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1139))
* 'WriteReqPool'.) (Cannot access a disposed object. ([#1112](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1112))
* On Azure deployment, getting "Unable to bind to http://localhost:9410 on the IPv6 loopback interface." ([#1001](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1001))

### Bugs Fixed

* Fix Crash under high load ([#1346](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1346))
* Deadlock in SocketOutput ([#1304](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1304))
* Call OnStarting before verifying response length ([#1303](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1303))
* Memory Leak in 1.1.0 ([#1264](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1264))

### Bugs Fixed

* Fix Crash under high load ([#1347](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1347))
* Deadlock in SocketOutput ([#1282](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1282))

### Bugs Fixed
- UvException (Error -4047 EPIPE broken pipe) timing out HTTP requests (rel/1.0.2) ([#1208](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1208))

### Features
- Reject requests that don't set Content-Length or Transfer-Encoding: chunked ([#1130](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1130))

### Bugs Fixed
- Attempting to write to HEAD response hangs the request ([#1202](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1202))
- NullReferenceException during server shutdown ([#1188](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1188))
- MemoryPoolIterator.PeekLong() sometimes returns invalid values ([#1183](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1183))
- Handle non "chunked" Transfer-Encoding request header values. ([#1181](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1181))
- Don't log ECONNRESET's between requests and during shutdown ([#1176](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1176))
- Kestrel considers `Connection: keep-alive, upgrade` as non-upgrade request ([#1170](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1170))
- TCP Loopback Fast Path causes occasional connection hangs ([#1147](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1147))
- HttpContext disposed before the error code is set. ([#876](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/876))

name: 1.1.0-preview1
body:
### Features
- Poor log message when trying to connect with https to an http endpoint ([#1116](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1116))
- Implement CopyToAsync on FrameRequestStream ([#1096](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1096))
- Make Kestrel's response buffer limit configurable ([#1061](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1061))
- Random 502 cgi gateway error when response 304 then flush response ([#952](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/952))
- Limit request line length ([#784](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/784))
- Use async/await in FilteredStreamAdapter.ReadInputAsync() ([#765](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/765))
- Return different status codes depending on condition ([#653](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/653))
- Add header limit parameters ([#475](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/475))
- Add keep-alive timeout parameter ([#464](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/464))

### Bugs Fixed
- Connection header "close" hangs ([#1104](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1104))
- TakeStartLine and TakeMessageHeaders can spin without awaiting given incomplete data ([#1095](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1095))
- Include port in EADDRINUSE exception ([#1086](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1086))
- Test returns block to pool twice ([#1013](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1013))
- Two tests don't return blocks to the memory pool ([#1012](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1012))
- Intermittent CI failure WritesDontCompleteImmediatelyWhenTooManyBytesIncludingNonImmediateAreAlreadyPreCompleted ([#1002](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1002))
- Assert "Block being garbage collected instead of returned to pool" on Travis/Linux ([#988](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/988))
- Read after connection error can throw two different exception types ([#975](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/975))
- HttpsContentFilter Error on Azure Service Fabric ([#960](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/960))
- Check for connection errors when attempting to read request data ([#959](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/959))
- When HttpResponse.Body is replaced, the replacement is used for future requests ([#940](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/940))
- Considering treating ECONNRESET as an error case ([#934](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/934))
- Setting Response.OnStarting should throw when response already started ([#806](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/806))
- StreamSocketOutput.WriteAsync is Sync on Full framework (SSL)  ([#768](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/768))
- Handle response content-length mis-match errors ([#175](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/175))

### Bugs Fixed
- When HttpResponse.Body is replaced, the replacement is used for future requests ([#1028](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1028))

### Features
- Include libuv in shared runtime instead of Kestrel packages ([#730](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/730))
- Improve request line parsing ([#683](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/683))
- Limit size of memory buffer when reading request ([#304](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/304))

### Bugs Fixed
- Reset Frame's IHttpRequestFeature.Headers and IHttpResponseFeature.Headers between requests ([#879](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/879))
- ServerAddress.FromUrl() should throw for invalid url ([#875](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/875))
- System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object at .Kestrel.Infrastructure.Headers.Initialize ([#866](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/866))
- ServerAddress.FromUrl("http://") throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException ([#860](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/860))
- Send 'Connection: close' in all 400 responses to HTTP/1.1 requests ([#840](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/840))
- FrameContext is an unneeded class ([#837](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/837))
- Client certificates are disposed before request can use them ([#830](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/830))
- NullReferenceException during shutdown ([#827](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/827))
- Don't bind if only port is specified. ([#814](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/814))
- Response allows setting StatusCode and ReasonPhrase after response was started ([#805](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/805))
- Kestrel Logs print full assembly name as category name ([#775](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/775))
- Remove DNX mono support for loading libuv ([#742](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/742))
- Bind to IPv6 loopback address when the "localhost" is specified ([#231](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/231))
- Move the response date header later ([#223](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/223))

name: 1.0.0-rc2
body:
### Features
- Add IWebHostBuilder.UseKestrel(options) overload to configure Kestrel ([#720](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/720))
- Consider adding UseKestrel extension method to IWebHostBuilder ([#713](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/713))
- Add CORS headers to known reponse headers to avoid initialization of unknown headers code path ([#389](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/389))
- Support ClientCertificate ([#332](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/332))
- Kestrel isn’t calling context.RequestAborted ([#297](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/297))
- RemoteIpAddress is not set by Kestrel ([#67](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/67))
- RequestAborted cancellation tokens not triggered for Kestrel ([#30](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/30))

### Bugs Fixed
- Race causing request corruption/data loss ([#782](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/782))
- Calling UseKestrel() (no args) then calling Configure<KestrelServerOptions> ends up with null service provider ([#755](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/755))
- Server crashes due to null reference when connection is aborted before frame is created ([#738](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/738))
- Exception at System.Net.Security.SslStreamInternal.EndRead when proxy request from Nginx to Kestrel through HTTPS ([#737](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/737))
- Race when consuming start line and headers sent immediately before client FIN ([#704](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/704))
- Allocations of Frame(Request|Response)Headers ([#695](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/695))
- Error -4082 EBUSY resource busy or locked ([#684](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/684))
- Wrong HTTP version in test response ([#672](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/672))
- Ssl Protocol should default to TLS1.2 only ([#637](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/637))
- Throw InvalidOperationException if the user tries to modify response headers after the body starts ([#628](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/628))
- Chunked responses are not flushed until the response completes ([#598](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/598))
- Properly return pooled blocks in SocketInput ([#580](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/580))
- System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Non-negative number required ([#579](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/579))
- Unable to load DLL 'libuv': The specified module could not be found - (kestrel) Windows IOT ([#488](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/488))
- Response header should accept null values ([#429](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/429))
- Don't wait to consume the entire request body for Connection: close requests ([#406](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/406))
- The default thread count should be reflected on KestrelServerInformation.ThreadCount during application start ([#404](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/404))
- Connection id "30" disconnected. ([#392](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/392))
- Frame._scheme is not reset per request ([#366](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/366))
- SocketOutput sometimes pre-completes too many writes which breaks throttling ([#356](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/356))
- Https package not being compiled against CoreCLR ([#345](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/345))
- rc1 INCOMPLETE_CHUNKED_ENCODING when using nginx ([#341](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/341))
- libuv should be in win7-arm and not win10-arm folder ([#340](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/340))
- Travis jamms/hangs ([#338](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/338))
- RequestBody draining still allocates per-request buffers ([#334](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/334))
- Don't throw UvException directly to users ([#299](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/299))
- Normalize URL ([#273](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/273))
- Call new IHttpContextFactory.Dispose(...) from request end ([#258](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/258))
- Kestrel takes 2-3 seconds to shutdown if any connections have been made ([#247](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/247))
- Multi-loop Kestrel on Windows blocked by libuv change ([#232](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/232))
- Issues running Kestrel on Linux: System.DllNotFoundException: libdl ([#78](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/78))

name: 1.0.0-rc1
body:
### Features
- Add API to IKestrelServerInformation to enable/disable Nagle's algorithm ([#172](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/172))
- Don't block when calling user-defined OnStarted and OnCompleted callbacks ([#143](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/143))
- Graceful crashing, logging ([#129](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/129))
- Support Https ([#83](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/83))

### Bugs Fixed
- Don't mask libuv load failures with a NullReferenceException ([#302](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/302))
- Consuming request body allocates a lot ([#296](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/296))
- Using Kestrel stand-alone sometimes gives 404's ([#270](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/270))
- Use DllImport for Libuv native binaries ([#244](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/244))
- Path should be unescaped ([#124](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/124))

name: 1.0.0-beta8
body:
### Features
- Style: Kestrel cleanup ([#184](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/184))
- Style: Refactor flow control ([#183](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/183))
- Support UNIX sockets ([#156](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/156))

### Bugs Fixed
- Unable to read big json file from Request.Body ([#234](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/234))
- MemoryPool2 OverflowException on x64 ([#227](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/227))
- Multi-thread Kestrel crashes on x64 DNX (CLR & Core CLR) on Windows (racy) ([#205](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/205))
- Gracefully fail if a Listener fails to start ([#185](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/185))
- Issue with ThreadCount > 1 on Linux ([#166](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/166))
- Terminal window hangs on linux after starting Kestrel server ([#108](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/108))
- ServerFactory.Start does not cleanup properly if exception after first engine.CreateServer ([#102](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/102))
- Running k kestrel should display the address and port that is being listened on ([#32](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/32))

name: 1.0.0-beta7
body:
### Features
- Automatically add "Server" header to responses ([#138](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/138))
- Implement chunked responses ([#97](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/97))
- Inconsistent package naming ([#11](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/11))

### Bugs Fixed
- Responses will never complete if nothing is written to the response body ([#173](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/173))
- Debug flaky test SocketOutputTests.CanWrite1MB ([#154](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/154))
- Kestrel becomes unresponsive when running sample under load ([#127](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/127))
- Returns 200 for unhandled exceptions ([#43](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/43))
- Exception in OnSendingHeaders not handled resulting in request hangs ([#25](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/25))

name: 1.0.0-beta6
body:
### Bugs Fixed
- Regression on stopping the server ([#111](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/111))

name: 1.0.0-beta3
body:
### Bugs Fixed
- Show proper exception when libuv not installed or failed to be loaded ([#41](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/41))

name: 1.0.0-alpha3
body:
### Bugs Fixed
- Stress: leaking Microsoft.AspNet.Server.Kestrel.Http.SocketOutput+ThisWriteReq as they are rooted by strong handles ([#19](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/19))
- Writing should use PostAsync to flow exception back to writer ([#17](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/17))
- Calling close on wrong thread should be avoided ([#16](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/16))
- UvMemory should be Weak in several cases ([#15](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/15))
- Null reference when running on osx ([#13](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/13))
- Parse names/ports from server urls ([#1](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/1))

### Features
- Web socket support ([#6](https://github.com/aspnet/KestrelHttpServer/issues/6))
